main.name: Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror
Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror

notes.text: After losing my kog rank up match to burn or mill 3 times in a row while playing aliens i threw together this archfiend build based off of dkayed's. Did not have the 3rd emperor or even a 3rd necrofear so i opted to run a lava golem because it has very niche applications that are pretty hilarious as well as it synergizes with the deck very well. Won all 5 games I played with it beating out mill, dark magician, new water, red eyes, amd finally aliens for kog
